titles.title: Agricultural Prompt Payment Act of 1987
A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to pay interest on late payments to farmers, ranchers, and other producers.

bill.summary: 7/9/1987--Introduced. Agricultural Prompt Payment Act of 1987 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to pay interest on any payment to a producer, rancher, or farmer under the Agricultural Act of 1949 or the conservation acreage reserve program when such a payment is not made within ten days of its due date. Directs the Secretary to include a required payment date in each contract entered into after this Act's enactment with respect to the affected programs.
